Is Crigler-Najjar syndrome inherited ?,"Crigler-Najjar syndrome is inherited in an autosomal recessive pattern, which means both copies of the UGT1A1 gene in each cell have mutations. A less severe condition called Gilbert syndrome can occur when one copy of the UGT1A1 gene has a mutation.",GHR,Crigler-Najjar syndrome
